ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class EditFragmentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.EditFragmentActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FView<Fragment>

    public class EditFragmentActivity
extends Activity
implements FView<Fragment>
    Activity for editing a fragment. Will allow the author to add text, illustrations, or choices for the current fragment. Upon button clicks, the activity will save the current fragment information and take the user back to the fragment list of the current story.

      • AddImage

        public void AddImage()
        Allows the user to import an image from either the camera or gallery through selection prompts. The image is put into a listview that is displayed for the current fragment. The function branches to "onActivityResult" which handles the image processing.
